ing.item: Boiled and mashed Great Northern or Navy beans
Powdered sugar or amount necessary to make stiff enough to handle

directions.step:
Flavor with maple syrup or Mapleine, add a few chopped peanuts. Mold with hands or between 2 spoons; drop on wax paper to harden.
This recipe came from: America Cooks, copyright 1917
Posted to recipelu-digest Volume 01 Number 187 by "Bonnie" <solomon1@kcsnet.com> on Nov 1, 1997
